00102             function                get_by_id( $id )
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00107                         
00108                         $Users = $this->UserAccess->unsafe_select( $this->UserAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00109 
00110                         if( count( $Users ) === 0 || count( $Users ) > 1 )
00111                         {
00112                               throw( new Exception( 'User with id '.$id.' was not found' ) );
00113                         }
00114                         else
00115                         {
00116                               return( $Users[ 0 ] );
00117                         }
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }

00135             function                session_start()
00136             {
00137                   if( session_id() == '' )
00138                   {
00139                         session_start();
00140                   }
00141             }

00161             function                logged_in()
00162             {
00163                   try
00164                   {
00165                         $this->session_start();
00166                         
00167                         if( isset( $_SESSION[ 'login' ] ) )
00168                         {
00169                               return( true );
00170                         }
00171 
00172                         return( false );
00173                   }
00174                   catch( Exception $e )
00175                   {
00176                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00177                   }
00178             }

00199             function                get_login()
00200             {
00201                   try
00202                   {
00203                         $this->session_start();
00204                         
00205                         if( $this->logged_in() )
00206                         {
00207                               /* залогинен, значит опознаем его */
00208                               return( $_SESSION[ 'login' ] );
00209                         }
00210                         else
00211                         {
00212                               /* не залогинен значит гость */
00213                               return( 'guest' );
00214                         }
00215                         
00216                         return( false );
00217                   }
00218                   catch( Exception $e )
00219                   {
00220                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00221                   }
00222             }

00242             function                get_id()
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         $this->session_start();
00247                         
00248                         if( $this->logged_in() )
00249                         {
00250                               /* залогинен, значит опознаем его */
00251                               return( $_SESSION[ 'user_id' ] );
00252                         }
00253                         else
00254                         {
00255                               /* не залогинен значит гость */
00256                               return( $this->UserAccess->GuestUserId );
00257                         }
00258

00260                   }
00261                   catch( Exception $e )

00286             {
00287                   try
00288                   {
00289                         if( $this->User === false )

00324             function                login( $Login , $id )
00325             {
00326                   try
00327                   {
00328                         if( $this->user_active( $Login ) )
00329                         {                             
00330                               $this->session_start();
00331                               
00332                               $_SESSION[ 'login' ] = $Login;
00333                               $_SESSION[ 'user_id' ] = $id;
00334                               
00335                               $this->User = false;
00336                         }
00337                         else
00338                         {
00339                               return( false );
00340                         }
00341                   }
00342                   catch( Exception $e )
00343                   {
00344                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00345                   }
00346             }

00401             function                user_active( $Login )
00402             {
00403                   try
00404                   {                       
00405                         $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $Login );
00406 
00407                         return( $User->active == 'active' );

00474             {

00514             function                user_exists( $Login )
00515             {
00516                   try
00517                   {
00518                         $Login = $this->Security->get( $Login , 'command' );
00519

00548             function                delete( $ids )
00549             {
00550                   try
00551                   {
00552                         $ids = $this->Security->get( $ids , 'integer_list' );
00553                         
00554                         $Users = $this->UserAccess->unsafe_select( $this->UserAccess->NativeTable.
00555                               ".id IN( $ids ) and `system` = 0" );
00556                         
00557                         $this->UserAccess->delete( implode( ',' , get_field_ex( $Users , 'id' ) ) );
00558                   }
00559                   catch( Exception $e )
00560                   {
00561                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00562                   }
00563             }
